summary: REQ-67 appears implemented: HomePage now smooth-scrolls to element id "premium-services-old" via scrollIntoView. REQ-66 (section id + exact h2 text) is indicated by the diff summary text, but the relevant section markup is not visible in the truncated HomePage.tsx excerpt. Two ancillary files were modified that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained repository meta-summary file content unrelated to changing the Home page section id/scroll target.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update HomePage.tsx section id and smooth-scroll target; it does not request updating summary/metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained project state metadata (project_state.json) unrelated to the requested Home page id/scroll behavior change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is frontend-only and specifically scoped to HomePage.tsx changes; project_state.json updates are not requested.
